title: Translation of "megadosis" in English
description: Translations in context of "megadosis" in Spanish-English from Reverso Context: Evita azúcares refinados, grasa saturada, vitaminas en megadosis, y alimentos densos en calorías.
cleaned_text: Evita azúcares refinados, grasa saturada, vitaminas en megadosis, y alimentos megadose vitamins and calorie-dense De acuerdo con la literatura científica actual, la megadosis de la vitamina C no es recomendada para la prevención o el tratamiento del cáncer. Based on the current scientific literature, megadose vitamin C is not recommended for the prevention or treatment of cancer. Supplements containing megadoses of folic acid without medical advice are not recommended. Si se desea tomar suplementos, no se recomiendan megadosis. If you want to take supplements, megadoses are not recommended. Las megadosis de vitaminas y minerales pueden ser tóxicas. Las megadosis no dan resultados más rápidos, y tampoco es más seguro usarlos en ciclos. Megadoses do not give faster results and using in cycles is not safer. There are many studies conducted regarding supplementing and/or megadosing different phytochemicals or herbs. There are supplements with megadoses of vitamin E, but they are not recommended and even they can be harmful to health. Many people think that taking just a few antioxidants - just one or two megadoses - is sufficient to maintain optimal health. However, extremely high doses may cause diarrhea, women are advised not to take megadoses of bioflavonoids.
